org.apache.struts2.osgi.host
Interface OsgiHost

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseOsgiHost, FelixOsgiHost, GlassfishOSGiHost
public interface OsgiHost

Implementations of this class start an OSGi container. They must also add the BundleContext to the ServletContext under the key OsgiHost.OSGI_BUNDLE_CONTEXT;
